pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.6: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.9: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.1.2: upasampanno upasampannaṃ hasādhippāyo kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.10: Anupasampannaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
